description: Omnissa Workspace ONE UEM contains a Secondary Context Path Traversal Vulnerability. A malicious actor may be able to gain access to sensitive information by sending crafted GET requests (read-only) to restricted API endpoints.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Omnissa Workspace ONE UEM version 23.10.0.49 or earlier
Omnissa Workspace ONE UEM version 24.6.0.34 or earlier
Omnissa Workspace ONE UEM version 24.2.0.29 or earlier
Omnissa Workspace ONE UEM version 24.10.0.10 or earlier
